analyzed: dassanena apahātabba hetuka duka kusala ttika

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetukam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam abyākatam dhammam paccayā nana dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate
analyzed: na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate
tīṇi abyākata vāre sabbattha paccaya vasena gaṇetabba
